author: Michael T
description: Firefox addon to help managing alts on beta.avabur.com

scripts.test-addon: eslint --ignore-pattern *.min.js --ignore-pattern /out/ ./ && (C:/"Program Files"/7-Zip/7z.exe a betaburlogin.xpi license manifest.json src && addons-linter --self-hosted betaburlogin.xpi & del betaburlogin.xpi) && echo tests finished
scripts.export-addon: C:/"Program Files"/7-Zip/7z.exe a ../betaburlogin.xpi license manifest.json src
